title: 1/25/18 - 'Talking Stick Glitch' (Bryan Caplan & Ben Shapiro join Glenn)
description:
Hour 1
Bigfoot indeed exists?...GLITCH: FBI failing to preserve 5 months of text messages…the most ‘selective and fortuitous’ glitch ever?? ...taking the government at its word...Russia was playing all sides ...Republican Susan Collins and her 'talking stick'...Glenn and Stu pass it around and a 'talking stick' debate ensues... ‘we've lost our bells’ ...NSA Deletes ‘Honesty’ and ‘Openness’ from Core Values...serving the leaders and not the people ... ‘Alexa, who is going to win the Super Bowl?’ ...Feminist propaganda algorithms?...Start fearing Facebook and Twitter?

 

Hour 2 
Google is growing so big so fast…the biggest lobbyists are in your phone, your life…data control = gold… ‘don’t be evil’…how do you define ‘evil,’ Google?...Stop wasting your money on a college education, says author and economics professor Bryan Caplan...just a ‘bunch of hoops’ resulting in a 'sticker'?... ‘less education’ is needed?...Every kid should 'not' go to college...1,000,000 Glenn Becks?...most professors are boring so brainwashing doesn't work

 

Hour 3 
Ben Shapiro drops in to discuss his recent ‘controversial’ speaking event at the University of Connecticut...President Trump, the good and the bad thus far?...flagging bad Trump vs. good Trump…President Trump = bad babysitter?... ‘Strong Efficient Market Theory’? ...AI pornography?...yea or nay on government surveillance?...an app that can frame you for crimes?...Nothing burgers and Taco Bell French fries?... ‘dark and crispy, perfect’…History has been made?

 
The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck and Stu Burguiere, Weekdays 9am–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
